# llms.txt
# Permission for LLMs to access and use content from this site.

User-Agent: *
Allow: /

# Optional: Explicitly allow major LLM crawlers
User-Agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-Agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /

User-Agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

User-Agent: CCBot
Allow: /

User-Agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /
